Header: 384 More Potential Army Retirees Ready for NVQ at CAVT
Content: A selected batch of 384 more potential Army retirees, including two Officers, expecting to receive vocational training shortly, prior to their retirement attended an introductory workshop that went on for a week (June 25 - July 02) at Saliyawewa Centre for Army Vocational Training (CAVT). The 7 day long initial workshop ended after a brief ceremony. Representing the Commandant, CAVT, Lieutenant Colonel Shashika  Perera, Commanding Officer, CAVT, Chief Instructor, CAVT and several officers attended the closing  ceremony and contributed to the event giving concluding remarks.
